section.title: Exercise: Adding e4 part descriptors to 3.x based applications
Target
section.para: In this exercise you add a model based part contribution to an Eclipse 3.x RCP application.

section.title: Adding a part descriptor
section.para: Create a simple plug-in called com.vogella.plugin.partdescriptor .

Add the following dependencies to your manifest file.
org.eclipse.core.runtime
org.eclipse.jface
org.eclipse.e4.ui.model.workbench
org.eclipse.e4.ui.di

Add a new model fragment to this plug-in via
File New Other... Eclipse 4 Model New Model Fragment
.

section.title: Validating
section.para: Start an instance of the Eclipse IDE and validate that you can open the parts via the Quick Access box (shortcut Ctrl+3).

note.para:
In Eclipse 4.4 the part descriptor can only be opened via the Quick Access box. In Eclipse 4.5 it is planned that it can also be opened via the
Window Show View
menu entry.
